price: da – po Njegovu naređenju – pozivaš k Allahu, i kao svjetiljku koja sija.
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
